# `r fontawesome::fa(name = "up-down-left-right")` Moving {background-color=var(--s1)}


## Within (sub)sections {.t1}

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="70%"}
![](assets/07/move_questions.mp4)
:::

::: {.column width="30%"}
- Hover over the left-hand part of the question
- Drag
- Drop
:::

::::

## Between sections {.t1}

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="70%"}
![](assets/06/move_question_to_section.mp4)
:::

::: {.column width="30%"}
- Click on the target question
- Scroll to the bottom of the right-hand panel
- Click on `MOVE TO`
- Select the destination section
:::

::::

# `r fontawesome::fa(name = "paste")` Copying {background-color=var(--s2)}

## Within questionnaire {.t2}

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="70%"}
![](assets/07/copy-paste_questions.mp4)
:::

::: {.column width="30%"}
- Right-click on question
- Select `Copy`
- Click just before desired insertion point
- Right-click on object
- Select `Paste after`
:::

::::

## Between questionnaires {.t2}

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="70%"}
![](assets/07/copy-paste_between_qnrs.mp4)
:::

::: {.column width="30%"}
- Right-click on question
- Select `Copy`
- Click just before desired insertion point
- Right-click on object
- Select `Paste after`
:::

::::

## Duplicates {.t2}

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="70%"}
![](assets/07/warning_duplicates.mp4)
:::

::: {.column width="30%"}

### Problem

- Variable names are unique IDs
- Compilation error

### Solution

- Navigate to the pasted question
- Change its variable name

:::

::::

## Dependencies {.t2}

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="70%"}
![](assets/07/warning_dependencies.mp4)
:::

::: {.column width="30%"}
- Delete broken references (e.g., questions, lookup tables, tc.)
:::

::::


# `r fontawesome::fa(name = "magnifying-glass")` Finding {background-color=var(--s3)}

## In section {.t3}

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="70%"}
![](assets/07/find_question_in_section.mp4)
:::

::: {.column width="30%"}
- Click on search icon
- Type
- See matching items
:::

::::

## In questionnaire {.t3}

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="70%"}
![](assets/07/search_question_in_qnr.mp4)
:::

::: {.column width="30%"}
- Type `Ctrl + H`
- Type query in `Find what field`
- Click on `FIND ALL` button
- Page through search results
:::
